titleInfo.title: Institutional disambiguation for further countries - an exploration with extensive use of wikidata (project report).

mods.abstract: This report has been generated from an internal documentation from a project in the context of the [German Competence Centre for Bibliometrics](http://www.bibliometrie.info/).
